data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Siaya, Kenya to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Siaya, Kenya
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Siaya, Kenya.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 2 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 417,816 believers in Siaya that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Siaya, Kenya.

Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Midgan people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Midgan people.
Spirit, teach the 417,816 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 842,300 souls living in the state of Siaya with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the state of Siaya against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

location.name: Siaya
location.people_groups_list: Chinese, general, Punjabi, Somali, Kachchi, Munyoyaya
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Chinese, general (35,000), Punjabi (67,000), Somali (3,050,000), Kachchi (80,000), Munyoyaya (2,100)
